Table of contents » Parallel tempering with PROFASI

Options peculiar to parallel tempering

  • --multiplexing or -mul : Switch on multiplexing
  • --initial_T_assignment or -initT : Initial temperature assignment in parallel tempering. The possible values are "adjacent","staggered" and "sorted". For 4 replicas with 2 fold multiplexing: "adjacent" means ranks 0, 1, 2 and 3 get temperature indices 0,0,1,1. "staggered" means ranks 0, 1, 2 and 3 get temperature indices 0,1,0,1. "sorted" means the temperature indices are decided by sorting the energies of the ranks, and giving the lowest temperatures (highest indices) to the lowest energies.
PROFASI: Protein Folding and Aggregation Simulator, Version 1.5
